nor marr'd

was she:

mastery;
So quick she bloomed, she seemed to
bloom at birth,

earth.

day

way;

But long-time dreamed, and out of
trouble wrung,
Fore-seen, wise-planned, pure child of
thought and pain,
Leapt our Minerva from a mortal
brain.

Sit on these Maryland hills, and fix
thy reign,
